title: Ruth Haas
summary: Ruth Haas is an American mathematician and professor at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. Previously she was the Achilles Professor of Mathematics at Smith College.[1] She received the M. Gweneth Humphreys Award from the Association for Women in Mathematics (AWM) in 2015 for her mentorship of women in mathematics.[2][1]  Haas was named an inaugural AWM Fellow in 2017.[3] In 2017 she was elected President of the AWM and on February 1, 2019 she assumed that position.[4]
